title: Authors and Citation
text: Nicolo Massari. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Massari N (2025). “ethord: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata Report Data.” doi:10.5281/zenodo.15497462, https://github.com/Global-Health-Engineering/ethord.
code: @Misc{massari:2025,   title = {ethord: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data},   author = {Nicolo Massari},   year = {2025},   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.15497462},   url = {https://github.com/Global-Health-Engineering/ethord},   abstract = {This data package contains metadata and report data from over 60 research projects funded by the joint Open Research Data (ORD) program of ETH Zurich, EPFL, and the four research institutes of the ETH Domain from 2020-2023. The package includes project-level metadata, such as project titles, descriptions, and categorizations (Establish, Explore, Contribute), as well as data extracted from reports submitted by each project, providing insights into the projects' objectives, methods, outcomes, and impacts.},   version = {0.0.2}, }

what: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data
title: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data
text: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata Report Data  data package contains metadata report data 60 research projects funded joint Open Research Data (ORD) program ETH Zurich, EPFL, four research institutes ETH Domain 2020-2023. package includes project-level metadata, project titles, descriptions, categorizations (Establish, Explore, Contribute), well data extracted reports submitted project, providing insights projects’ objectives, methods, outcomes, impacts.

what: details: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — details
title: details: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — details
text: data package contains metadata report data 60 research projects funded joint Open Research Data (ORD) program ETH Zurich, EPFL, four research institutes ETH Domain 2020-2023. package includes project-level metadata, project titles, descriptions, categorizations (Establish, Explore, Contribute), well data extracted reports submitted project, providing insights projects' objectives, methods, outcomes, impacts.

title: details: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — details
details: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — details
text: tibble 9 rows 20 variables project_id unique identifier assigned project. call_category category project call, Explore Contribute. applicant_id unique identifier assigned applicant. main_applicant_institution_name name main institution associated applicant. applicant_type type applicant, Primary Secondary. applicant_title title applicant, Prof. Dr. applicant_first_name first name applicant. applicant_last_name last name applicant. applicant_gender gender applicant, categorized Female Male. applicant_institution institution associated applicant. applicant_department_name name department associated applicant. applicant_lab_name name lab associated applicant. applicant_orcid_id ORCID identifier applicant. title title project. acronym shortened form project title. abstract brief summary project. keywords Relevant keywords associated project. project_start_dd_mm_yyyy start date project format DD.MM.YYYY. project_duration_months duration project months. funding_requested amount funding requested project.

what: ethord: The swissopenuniversities ORD projects metadata package — ethord
title: ethord: The swissopenuniversities ORD projects metadata package — ethord
text: Metadata relative project funded Open Research Data (ORD) initiative swissuniversities.

title: ethord: The swissopenuniversities ORD projects metadata package — ethord
ethord: The swissopenuniversities ORD projects metadata package — ethord
text: tibble 96 rows 8 variables url URL project, providing access project's documentation resources. title title project, describing main objectives scope. category category project, indicating primary focus area study. institutions institutions involved project, providing context research development. data_type type data generated used project, describing nature format. field field study domain project belongs, indicating broader context. researchers names researchers involved project, providing information team expertise. abstract brief summary project's objectives, methods, expected outcomes, providing overview research.

what: ord_portal: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — ord_portal
title: ord_portal: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — ord_portal
text: data package contains metadata report data 60 research projects funded joint Open Research Data (ORD) program ETH Zurich, EPFL, four research institutes ETH Domain 2020-2023. package includes project-level metadata, project titles, descriptions, categorizations (Establish, Explore, Contribute), well data extracted reports submitted project, providing insights projects' objectives, methods, outcomes, impacts.

title: ord_portal: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — ord_portal
ord_portal: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — ord_portal
text: tibble 96 rows 8 variables url URL associated research project, likely linking detailed information resources. title title research project, providing brief summary focus objective. category category classification research project, possible values including Contribute, Explore, Establish. institutions institutions organizations involved supporting research project, EPFL, ETH Zurich, Empa. data_type type classification data associated research project, microstructure data, environmental data, medical data. field broader field study domain research project belongs , including Materials Science, Earth sciences, Life sciences. researchers names researchers individuals involved project, listed format 'Last Name, First Name'. abstract brief summary abstract research project, providing overview objectives, methods, findings.

what: outputs: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — outputs
title: outputs: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — outputs
text: data package contains metadata report data 60 research projects funded joint Open Research Data (ORD) program ETH Zurich, EPFL, four research institutes ETH Domain 2020-2023. package includes project-level metadata, project titles, descriptions, categorizations (Establish, Explore, Contribute), well data extracted reports submitted project, providing insights projects' objectives, methods, outcomes, impacts.

title: outputs: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — outputs
outputs: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — outputs
text: tibble 60 rows 7 variables project_id unique identifier project, represented numerical value. item_id unique identifier item within project, represented numerical value decimal places. item_name_long detailed name describing item, 'New enhanced webs' 'New enhanced data'. item_name_short brief name summarizing item, 'website', 'repository', 'dataset'. quantity number items, represented discrete numerical value. description text description providing additional context item. link URL linking item associated webpage.

title: proposals: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — proposals
proposals: Open Research Data (ORD) Program Project Metadata and Report Data — proposals
text: tibble 25 rows 12 variables project_id unique identifier project dataset. cost_number numerical identifier specific cost expenditure within project. cost_personnel_senior_staff_fr cost personnel senior staff Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_personnel_postdocs_fr cost personnel postdoctoral researchers Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_personnel_other_fr cost personnel staff members Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_personnel_students_fr cost personnel students Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_travel_fr cost travel expenses Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_equipment_fr cost equipment purchases Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_publication_fr cost publication expenses Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_social_fr cost social expenses Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_other_fr cost miscellaneous expenses Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement. cost_subcontracting_fr cost subcontracting services Swiss Francs (CHF). continuous numerical measurement.
